sourcing.instructions: - Manganese dioxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: - Manganese dioxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. Measure out 120 g of manganese dioxide, 80 g of terbium oxide, and 60 g of thulium oxide.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 120 g of manganese dioxide, 80 g of terbium oxide, and 60 g of thulium oxide.

steps: 1. Preheat the oven to 120 째C (248 째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat the oven to 120 째C (248 째F).

steps: 1. Turn off the oven and allow the sample to cool gradually inside the oven for 30 minutes.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the oven and allow the sample to cool gradually inside the oven for 30 minutes.

steps: 1. Once the sample has cooled completely, carefully demold the solid material.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once the sample has cooled completely, carefully demold the solid material.
